General.Name: Canadian Manganese Company Inc.
General.Description: Canadian Manganese Company Inc. engages in the exploration and development of manganese properties in the province of New Brunswick, Canada. It owns interest in the Woodstock project located in New Brunswick. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 55 University Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2H7
